attributes.action: ensure doctors and medical staff alike are truthfully made aware of this life debilitating illness as in FIBROMYALGIA. And to lead the way for a cure or at the most a light at the end of such a painful dark tunnel!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have spent 4 years being poked and prodded. passed from one consultant to the next. feeling such a fraud on this journey to the point where i could not live out this life any more if it meant being branded an attention seeker for the rest of my days, seeking help and being sent home with nothing more than PARACETAMOL!! There is no help or information at all for us or our families,who suffer with Fibromyalgia,cfs,cps. Being a mum is the hardest job in the world but, being a mum with fm amongst other things is suicidal!! we need help all of us. the only get out clause we have is the fibromyalgia asscotiation site. thats ridiculous in this country in the year 2007.
